front.title: Extensions to RSVP-TE for P2MP LSP Egress Local Protection

abstract.t: This document describes extensions to Resource Reservation Protocol - Traffic Engineering (RSVP-TE) for locally protecting egress nodes of Traffic Engineered (TE) point-to-multipoint (P2MP) Label Switched Paths (LSPs) in Multi-Protocol Label Switching (MPLS) and Generalized MPLS (GMPLS) networks.
